00031 
00032 void initQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv *env){
00033     // init MPI environment
00034     int rank, numRanks, initialized;
00035     MPI_Initialized(&initialized);
00036     if (!initialized){
00037         MPI_Init(NULL, NULL);
00038         MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &numRanks);
00039         MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
00040 
00041         env->rank=rank;
00042         env->numRanks=numRanks;
00043 
00044     } else printf("ERROR: Trying to initialize QuESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00045 }
00046 
00047 void syncQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00048     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00049 }
00050 
00051 int syncQuESTSuccess(int successCode){
00052     int totalSuccess;
00053     MPI_Allreduce(&successCode, &totalSuccess, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_LAND, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00054     return totalSuccess;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void closeQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00058     int finalized;
00059     MPI_Finalized(&finalized);
00060     if (!finalized) MPI_Finalize();
00061     else printf("ERROR: Trying to close QuESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00062 }
00063 
00064 void reportQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00065     if (env.rank==0){
00066         printf("EXECUTION ENVIRONMENT:\n"); 
00067         printf("Running distributed (MPI) version\n");
00068         printf("Number of ranks is %d\n", env.numRanks);
00069 # ifdef _OPENMP
00070         printf("OpenMP enabled\n");
00071         printf("Number of threads available is %d\n", omp_get_max_threads());
00072 # else
00073         printf("OpenMP disabled\n");
00074 # endif 
00075         printf("Precision: size of REAL is %ld bytes\n", sizeof(REAL));
00076     }
00077 }

00079 void reportNodeList(QuESTEnv env){
00080     char hostName[256];
00081     gethostname(hostName, 255);
00082     printf("hostname on rank %d: %s\n", env.rank, hostName);
00083 }

00085 int getChunkIdFromIndex(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00086     return index/multiQubit.numAmps; // this is numAmpsPerChunk
00087 }
00088 
00089 REAL getRealAmpEl(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00090     int chunkId = getChunkIdFromIndex(multiQubit, index);
00091     REAL el; 
00092     if (multiQubit.chunkId==chunkId){
00093         el = multiQubit.stateVec.real[index-chunkId*multiQubit.numAmps];
00094     }
00095     MPI_Bcast(&el, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, chunkId, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00096     return el; 
00097 } 
00098 
00099 REAL getImagAmpEl(MultiQubit multiQubit, long long int index){
00100     int chunkId = getChunkIdFromIndex(multiQubit, index);
00101     REAL el; 
00102     if (multiQubit.chunkId==chunkId){
00103         el = multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index-chunkId*multiQubit.numAmps];
00104     }
00105     MPI_Bcast(&el, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, chunkId, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00106     return el; 
00107 }
00108 
00109 REAL calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00110     // Implemented using Kahan summation for greater accuracy at a slight floating
00111     //   point operation overhead. For more details see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kahan_summation_algorithm
00112     REAL pTotal=0; 
00113     REAL y, t, c;
00114     REAL allRankTotals=0;
00115     long long int index;
00116     long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00117     c = 0.0;
00118     for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00119         // Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]; by Kahan
00120         y = multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index] - c;
00121         t = pTotal + y;
00122         // Don't change the bracketing on the following line
00123         c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00124         pTotal = t;
00125         // Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]; by Kahan
00126         y = multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index] - c;
00127         t = pTotal + y;
00128         // Don't change the bracketing on the following line
00129         c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00130         pTotal = t;
00131     } 
00132     if (multiQubit.numChunks>1) MPI_Allreduce(&pTotal, &allRankTotals, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00133     else allRankTotals=pTotal;
00134 
00135     return allRankTotals;
00136 }

00146 
00147 static int chunkIsUpper(int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00148 {       
00149     long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00150     long long int sizeBlock = sizeHalfBlock*2;
00151     long long int posInBlock = (chunkId*chunkSize) % sizeBlock;
00152     return posInBlock<sizeHalfBlock;
00153 }
00154 
00169 static void getRotAngle(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00170 {
00171     if (chunkIsUpper){
00172         *rot1=alpha;
00173         rot2->real=-beta.real;
00174         rot2->imag=-beta.imag;
00175     } else {
00176         *rot1=beta;
00177         *rot2=alpha;
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00194 static void getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00195 {
00196     if (chunkIsUpper){
00197         *rot1=u.r0c0;
00198         *rot2=u.r0c1;
00199     } else {
00200         *rot1=u.r1c0;
00201         *rot2=u.r1c1;
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00214 static int getChunkPairId(int chunkIsUpper, int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00215 {
00216     long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00217     int chunksPerHalfBlock = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00218     if (chunkIsUpper){
00219         return chunkId + chunksPerHalfBlock;
00220     } else {
00221         return chunkId - chunksPerHalfBlock;
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00232 static int halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(long long int chunkSize, int targetQubit)
00233 {
00234     long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (targetQubit);
00235     if (chunkSize > sizeHalfBlock) return 1;
00236     else return 0;
00237 }
00238 
00239 void exchangeStateVectors(MultiQubit multiQubit, int pairRank){
00240     // MPI send/receive vars
00241     int TAG=100;
00242     MPI_Status status;
00243 
00244     // Multiple messages are required as MPI uses int rather than long long int for count
00245     // For openmpi, messages are further restricted to 2GB in size -- do this for all cases
00246     // to be safe
00247     long long int maxMessageCount = 1LL<<29;
00248     if (sizeof(REAL)==8) maxMessageCount = (1LL<<28);
00249     else if (sizeof(REAL)==16) maxMessageCount = (1LL<<27);
00250 
00251     if (multiQubit.numAmps<maxMessageCount) maxMessageCount = multiQubit.numAmps;
00252     int numMessages = multiQubit.numAmps/maxMessageCount;
00253     int i;
00254     long long int offset;
00255     // send my state vector to pairRank's multiQubit.pairStateVec
00256     // receive pairRank's state vector into multiQubit.pairStateVec
00257     for (i=0; i<numMessages; i++){
00258         offset = i*maxMessageCount;
00259         MPI_Sendrecv(&multiQubit.stateVec.real[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL, pairRank, TAG,
00260                 &multiQubit.pairStateVec.real[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL,
00261                 pairRank, TAG, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00262         //printf("rank: %d err: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, err);
00263         MPI_Sendrecv(&multiQubit.stateVec.imag[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL, pairRank, TAG,
00264                 &multiQubit.pairStateVec.imag[offset], maxMessageCount, MPI_QuEST_REAL,
00265                 pairRank, TAG, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00266     }
00267 }
00268 
00269 void compactUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00270 {
00271     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00272     QuESTAssert(validateAlphaBeta(alpha, beta), 6, __func__);
00273 
00274     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00275     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00276     Complex rot1, rot2;
00277 
00278     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00279     int rankIsUpper;
00280     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00281 
00282     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00283         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00284         compactUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00285     } else {
00286         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00287         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00288         getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00289         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00290         // get corresponding values from my pair
00291         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00292 
00293         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. 
00294         // send values to compactUnitaryDistributed in the correct order
00295         if (rankIsUpper){
00296             compactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00297                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00298                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00299                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00300         } else {
00301             compactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00302                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00303                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00304                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00305         }
00306     }
00307 }
00308 
00309 void unitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00310 {
00311     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00312     QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00313 
00314     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00315     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00316     Complex rot1, rot2;
00317 
00318     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00319     int rankIsUpper;
00320     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00321 
00322     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00323         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00324         unitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, u);
00325     } else {
00326         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00327         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00328         getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00329         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00330         // get corresponding values from my pair
00331         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00332 
00333         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. 
00334         // send values to compactUnitaryDistributed in the correct order
00335         if (rankIsUpper){
00336             unitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00337                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00338                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00339                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00340         } else {
00341             unitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00342                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00343                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00344                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00345         }
00346     }
00347 
00348 
00349 }

00351 void controlledCompactUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00352 {
00353     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00354     QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00355     QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00356     QuESTAssert(validateAlphaBeta(alpha, beta), 6, __func__);
00357 
00358     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00359     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00360     Complex rot1, rot2;
00361 
00362     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00363     int rankIsUpper;
00364     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00365 
00366     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00367         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00368         controlledCompactUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit, alpha, beta);
00369     } else {
00370         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00371         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00372         getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00373         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00374         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00375         // get corresponding values from my pair
00376         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00377 
00378         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed
00379         // in the correct order
00380         if (rankIsUpper){
00381             controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00382                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00383                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00384                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00385         } else {
00386             controlledCompactUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00387                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00388                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00389                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00390         }
00391     }
00392 }

00394 void controlledUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit, 
00395         ComplexMatrix2 u)
00396 {
00397     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00398     QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00399     QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00400     QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00401 
00402     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00403     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00404     Complex rot1, rot2;
00405 
00406     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00407     int rankIsUpper;
00408     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00409 
00410     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00411         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00412         controlledUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit, u);
00413     } else {
00414         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00415         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00416         getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00417         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00418         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00419         // get corresponding values from my pair
00420         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00421 
00422         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledUnitaryDistributed
00423         // in the correct order
00424         if (rankIsUpper){
00425             controlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00426                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00427                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00428                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00429         } else {
00430             controlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,rot1,rot2,
00431                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00432                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00433                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00434         }
00435     }
00436 }

00438 void multiControlledUnitary(MultiQubit multiQubit, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const int targetQubit, ComplexMatrix2 u)
00439 {
00440     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00441     QuESTAssert(numControlQubits > 0 && numControlQubits <= multiQubit.numQubits, 4, __func__);
00442     QuESTAssert(validateMatrixIsUnitary(u), 5, __func__);
00443 
00444     long long int mask=0;
00445     for (int i=0; i<numControlQubits; i++) mask = mask | (1LL<<controlQubits[i]);
00446     QuESTAssert(mask >=0 && mask <= (1LL<<multiQubit.numQubits)-1, 2, __func__);
00447     QuESTAssert((mask & (1LL<<targetQubit)) != (1LL<<targetQubit), 3, __func__);
00448 
00449     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00450     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00451     Complex rot1, rot2;
00452 
00453     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00454     int rankIsUpper;
00455     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00456 
00457     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00458         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00459         multiControlledUnitaryLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, mask, u);
00460     } else {
00461         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00462         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00463         getRotAngleFromUnitaryMatrix(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, u);
00464         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00465         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00466         // get corresponding values from my pair
00467         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00468 
00469         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to multiControlledUnitaryDistributed
00470         // in the correct order
00471         if (rankIsUpper){
00472             multiControlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,mask,rot1,rot2,
00473                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00474                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00475                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00476         } else {
00477             multiControlledUnitaryDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,mask,rot1,rot2,
00478                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00479                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00480                     multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00481         }
00482     }
00483 }
00484 void sigmaX(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00485 {
00486     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00487 
00488     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00489     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00490 
00491     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00492     int rankIsUpper;
00493     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00494 
00495     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00496         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00497         sigmaXLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00498     } else {
00499         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00500         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00501         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00502         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00503         // get corresponding values from my pair
00504         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00505         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. sigmaX just replaces
00506         // this rank's values with pair values
00507         sigmaXDistributed(multiQubit, targetQubit,
00508                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, // in
00509                 multiQubit.stateVec); // out
00510     }
00511 }
00512 
00513 void controlledNot(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int controlQubit, const int targetQubit)
00514 {
00515     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00516     QuESTAssert(controlQubit >= 0 && controlQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00517     QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, 3, __func__);
00518 
00519     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00520     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00521 
00522     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00523     int rankIsUpper;
00524     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00525 
00526     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00527         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00528         controlledNotLocal(multiQubit, controlQubit, targetQubit);
00529     } else {
00530         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00531         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00532         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00533         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00534         // get corresponding values from my pair
00535         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00536         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to controlledNot
00537         // in the correct order
00538         if (rankIsUpper){
00539             controlledNotDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,
00540                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //in
00541                     multiQubit.stateVec); //out
00542         } else {
00543             controlledNotDistributed(multiQubit,controlQubit,targetQubit,
00544                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //in
00545                     multiQubit.stateVec); //out
00546         }
00547     }
00548 }
00549 
00550 void sigmaY(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00551 {
00552     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00553 
00554     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00555     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00556 
00557     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00558     int rankIsUpper;
00559     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00560 
00561     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00562         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00563         sigmaYLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00564     } else {
00566         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00567         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00568         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00569         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00570         // get corresponding values from my pair
00571         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00572         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. sigmaX just replaces
00573         // this rank's values with pair values
00574         sigmaYDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00575                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, // in
00576                 multiQubit.stateVec, // out
00577                 rankIsUpper);
00578     }
00579 }
00580 
00581 void phaseGate(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit, enum phaseGateType type)
00582 {
00583     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00584 
00585     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00586     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00587 
00588     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00589     int rankIsUpper;
00590 
00591     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00592         phaseGateLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit, type);
00593     } else {
00594         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00595         if (!rankIsUpper) phaseGateDistributed(multiQubit, targetQubit, type);
00596     }
00597 }
00598 
00599 void hadamard(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int targetQubit)
00600 {
00601     QuESTAssert(targetQubit >= 0 && targetQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 1, __func__);
00602 
00603     // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00604     int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00605 
00606     // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00607     int rankIsUpper;
00608     int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00609 
00610     if (useLocalDataOnly){
00611         // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00612         hadamardLocal(multiQubit, targetQubit);
00613     } else {
00614         // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00615         rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00616         pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, targetQubit);
00617         //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00618         // get corresponding values from my pair
00619         exchangeStateVectors(multiQubit, pairRank);
00620         // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to hadamardDistributed
00621         // in the correct order
00622         if (rankIsUpper){
00623             hadamardDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00624                     multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00625                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00626                     multiQubit.stateVec, rankIsUpper); //output
00627         } else {
00628             hadamardDistributed(multiQubit,targetQubit,
00629                     multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00630                     multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00631                     multiQubit.stateVec, rankIsUpper); //output
00632         }
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 
00647 static int isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(int chunkId, long long int chunkSize, int measureQubit)
00648 {
00649     long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (measureQubit);
00650     int numChunksToSkip = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00651     // calculate probability by summing over numChunksToSkip, then skipping numChunksToSkip, etc
00652     int bitToCheck = chunkId & numChunksToSkip;
00653     return bitToCheck;
00654 }
00655 
00656 REAL findProbabilityOfOutcome(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00657 {
00658     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00659 
00660     REAL stateProb=0, totalStateProb=0;
00661     int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00662     if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00663         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00664     } else {
00665         if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00666             stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroDistributed(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00667         } else stateProb = 0;
00668     }
00669     MPI_Allreduce(&stateProb, &totalStateProb, 1, MPI_QuEST_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00670     if (outcome==1) totalStateProb = 1.0 - totalStateProb;
00671     return totalStateProb;
00672 }
00673 
00674 
00675 REAL collapseToOutcome(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00676 {
00677     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00678     QuESTAssert((outcome==0 || outcome==1), 10, __func__);
00679 
00680     REAL totalStateProb=findProbabilityOfOutcome(multiQubit, measureQubit, outcome);
00681     QuESTAssert(fabs(totalStateProb)>REAL_EPS, 8, __func__);
00682 
00683     int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00684     if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00685         collapseToOutcomeLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit, totalStateProb, outcome);
00686     } else {
00687         if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00688             // chunk has amps for q=0
00689             if (outcome==0) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00690                     totalStateProb);
00691             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00692         } else {
00693             // chunk has amps for q=1
00694             if (outcome==1) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00695                     totalStateProb);
00696             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00697         }
00698     }
00699     return totalStateProb;
00700 }
00701 
00702 
00703 int measure(MultiQubit multiQubit, int measureQubit){
00704     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00705     REAL stateProb; 
00706     return measureWithStats(multiQubit, measureQubit, &stateProb); 
00707 }
00708 
00709 int measureWithStats(MultiQubit multiQubit, int measureQubit, REAL *stateProb){
00710     QuESTAssert(measureQubit >= 0 && measureQubit < multiQubit.numQubits, 2, __func__);
00711 
00712     int outcome;
00713     // find probability of qubit being in state 1
00714     REAL stateProbInternal = findProbabilityOfOutcome(multiQubit, measureQubit, 1);
00715 
00716     // we can't collapse to a state that has a probability too close to zero
00717     if (stateProbInternal<REAL_EPS) outcome=0;
00718     else if (1-stateProbInternal<REAL_EPS) outcome=1;
00719     else {
00720         // ok. both P(0) and P(1) are large enough to resolve
00721         // generate random float on [0,1]
00722         float randNum = genrand_real1();
00723         if (randNum<=stateProbInternal) outcome = 1;
00724         else outcome = 0;
00725     } 
00726     if (outcome==0) stateProbInternal = 1-stateProbInternal;
00727 
00728     int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00729     if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00730         collapseToOutcomeLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit, stateProbInternal, outcome);
00731     } else {
00732         if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00733             // chunk has amps for q=0
00734             if (outcome==0) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00735                     stateProbInternal);
00736             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00737         } else {
00738             // chunk has amps for q=1
00739             if (outcome==1) collapseToOutcomeDistributedRenorm(multiQubit, measureQubit, 
00740                     stateProbInternal);
00741             else collapseToOutcomeDistributedSetZero(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00742         }
00743     }
00744 
00745     *stateProb = stateProbInternal;
00746     return outcome;
00747 }
00748 
00749 void exitWithError(int errorCode, const char* func){
00750     printf("!!!\n");
00751     printf("QuEST Error in function %s: %s\n", func, errorCodes[errorCode]);
00752     printf("!!!\n");
00753     printf("exiting..\n");
00754     MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD, errorCode);
00755 }
00756 
00757 void QuESTAssert(int isValid, int errorCode, const char* func){
00758     if (!isValid) exitWithError(errorCode, func);
00759 }
